I don't know if this is the right place to post this, but I'm having trouble playing quest games when I play them it starts to glitch like I move from one room to another the places and items changes but the text doesn't recognize I left the room to another and them everything I do after that does nothing, I have tried playing these games download's and online on two browsers and it keeps happening after a few minutes and when I restart my save the game glitches in the same place every time but not in a new game. No one else seems to be having these problems with these games is it my computer?
Also I forgot online the games have become very lagging if that's relivent
